title: dependancy on system.drawing.common in SkiaSharp.Views.Desktop.Common
body:
From SkiaSharp.Views.Desktop.Common 2.80.3+ there is now a dependancy on system.drawing.common. this library is not very cross platform friendly.
2.80.2 is ok, it is the addition of the extension methods that are causing the reliance on the new dependancy.

https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/blob/main/source/SkiaSharp.Views/SkiaSharp.Views.Shared/Extensions.cs

is there any plan to change this in the future, or create a seperate extension library?
